parameters.text:
You are an expert OCR financial analyst. Extract all 12 data points listed below from the attached **image** and return the output as a single, clean JSON object. Do not include any commentary.

**FIELDS:** "Invoice No.", "Dated", "Buyer's Order No.", "Supplier Name", "Supplier GSTIN/UIN", "Taxable Value", "CGST Amount", "SGST/UTGST Amount", "Total Tax Amount", "Total (Grand Total)", "HSN/SAC", "Quantity (M.T./Kgs)"
